meanings.definition: An exclamation used to express pleasure or satisfaction from eating something delicious.
meanings.sent1: Yum! This cake is so good!
meanings.sent3: Yum! I can't stop eating these chips!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the freshly baked bread was a yum that filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The ice cream was a yum explosion in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: The yum pizza was gone in minutes.
meanings.sent2: She made a yum pasta dish for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The yum cupcakes disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: The yum strawberries tasted like summer in a bite.
meanings.sent5: The yum burger was the highlight of the barbecue.
